mainHero.title: ACM Semicode
mainHero.subtitle: Is back
mainHero.description: SemiCode is a tag team coding contest that takes place in Mumbai and is organized by NMIMS Mumbai's technical body, ACM MPSTME in association with other colleges such as SNDT, MHSSCE, and FRCRCE. This competition brings together some of the brightest minds in the field of competitive coding from across Mumbai. The competition is designed to test the participants' problem-solving skills, time management, and ability to coordinate as a team.

items.title: Round 1
items.description: This will be an online round, where participants would have to crack a set of questions assigned to your team within a duration of 2 hours on the day of the competition. Starts on 19th March '23!

items.title: Round 2
items.description: Round 2 will commence offline, with intermediate level of questions. Show your team's individual coding excellence and prove your mettle! Offline from 10 AM, 25 March 2023 at MPSTME, Mumbai.

items.title: Round 3
items.description: Beat round 2? Buck up  and compete against the best coding tag-teams of Mumbai, and claim your spot on the leaderboard! Offline from 2 PM, 25 March 2023 at MPSTME, Mumbai.

features.title: Meet your Weapons!
features.subtitle: All the best languages out there!
features.description: Prefer the Vector Optimizations in C++ or perhaps Python's simplicity? Offering the best languages that you can code in for competitive programming, levelling the playing field for all!

items.name: C
items.description: C is a high-performance language for system programming, embedded systems, and OS development.

items.name: C++
items.description: C++ is an object oriented language for system programming, embedded systems, and high-performance apps.

items.name: Python
items.description: Python is a versatile, high-level language for web dev, data analysis, AI, etc., known for its simplicity and readability.

items.name: Java
items.description: Java is an object-oriented language with platform independence, used for developing apps from mobile to enterprise systems.

items.name: JavaScript
items.description: JavaScript is a high-level language for client-side web development, interactive interfaces, and server-side apps with Node.js.

items.name: Rust
items.description: Rust is a modern, systems programming language designed to provide fast, reliable, and safe performance, with a focus on memory safety and concurrency.

items.title: Digital Ocean
items.description: DigitalOcean simplifies cloud computing so developers and businesses can spend more time building software that changes the world. With its mission-critical infrastructure and fully managed offerings, DigitalOcean helps developers, startups and small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) rapidly build, deploy and scale applications to accelerate innovation and increase productivity and agility.
